about.aboutRequestAndWorkText:
We are looking for voice material requests and voice-related jobs.
Please feel free to contact us using the contact form.
about.aboutTheUseOfMaterialsText:
All voice materials are available free of charge.
The copyright is not abandoned.
Please refrain from redistributing voice materials.
Please refrain from using sites that are offensive to public order and morals or that violate the law.
Please refrain from using it for antisocial forces or illegal activities.
In addition, please refrain from improper use.
